name: Time elapsed since initial recognition derivation rule
description: This derivation rule aims to obtain the Time elapsed since initial recognition from its building blocks.
algorithm:
SET TM_SNC_RCGNTN = DT_RFRNC - TKN_PSSSSN_DT,
    TM_SNC_INTL_RCGNTN = 
        CASE
            WHEN TM_SNC_RCGNTN / 365 > 0 AND TM_SNC_RCGNTN / 365 <= 1 THEN 20
            WHEN TM_SNC_RCGNTN / 365 > 1 AND TM_SNC_RCGNTN / 365 <= 2 THEN 27
            WHEN TM_SNC_RCGNTN / 365 > 2 AND TM_SNC_RCGNTN / 365 <= 5 THEN 29
            WHEN TM_SNC_RCGNTN / 365 > 5 THEN 37
        END;
